about_the_game:
A kit with EZAPAC Marksman Diablo in his Sand Devil Legendary Outfit, and items to speed up progress.

This kit contains:

  • Marksman operator Diablo from the EZAPAC collection:

Diablo is the kind of Marksman that likes to stay close to the action. He is armed with a modified H&K G36 ZN assault rifle that allows him to efficiently provide cover for his team at medium range, and a GL06 grenade launcher that boosts his firepower. His H&K USP SD pistol lets him fight back at close range in a pinch. Diablo’s primary ability, Inferno, burns enemies and prevents them from healing, while making him immune to burning.

  • Sand Devil Legendary Outfit for Diablo:

An alternate outfit, primary weapon SIG MCX 20 and secondary weapon H&K USP Match. Increases the operator’s XP gain by 25%.

  • 30 days of Premium:

Premium speeds up in-game progress and unlocks Premium objectives.

— +20% XP if all teammates have active Premium.

— +10% XP to all teammates.

— +100% XP for all types of combat.

— +30% XP in the new Battle Pass.

  • 3 Enhanced XP boosters:

Each Enhanced XP booster has a capacity of 20,000 XP and grants +200% XP per battle. Allows you to earn more XP in battle, to speed up the operator’s progress and gain more Credits.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, Cruelty or Gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960+ / AMD HD 7xxx+
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 / AMD Ryzen 7 2700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 / AMD Radeon R9 390X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
